vooga.towerdefense.factories.actionfactories

Class AreaOfEffectPackageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.factories.actionfactories.ActionFactory
      • vooga.towerdefense.factories.actionfactories.AreaOfEffectPackageFactory

  • public class AreaOfEffectPackageFactory
extends ActionFactory
    Factory creates an action combo that does an area of effect, for speeding up game creation.
    Author:
    Zhen Gou
